name: Cheetahs
descr:
At last, Shock Absorption and Ankle Support in one lightweight unit. TULI`s Cheetahs are a dynamic and revolutionary new combination of TULI`s Heel Cups shock absorbtion technology and the comfort and stability of a lightweight neoprene ankle support. TULI`s Cheetahs are ideal for all people.

One size fits all comes with adjustable velcro straps.
